statements: SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, email FROM clients ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT client_name, phone_number FROM clients ORDER BY phone_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, email FROM clients WHERE client_id > 5 ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT client_name, phone_number FROM clients WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT client_id, client_name, email, phone_number FROM clients WHERE client_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, email, phone_number FROM clients;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects;
SELECT client_name, email, address FROM clients;
SELECT project_name, budget, status FROM projects;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, email FROM clients WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, budget FROM projects WHERE STATUS = 'In Progress' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, email, phone_number, address FROM clients JOIN projects ON clients.client_id = projects.client_id WHERE projects.status = 'Completed';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM projects WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY budget DESC, project_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE client_id = 2 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, phone_number FROM clients WHERE client_id = 3 AND email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT project_name, style, color_scheme, furniture_pref FROM projects p JOIN design_preferences dp ON p.project_id = dp.project_id WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, email FROM clients WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT clients.client_name, projects.project_name, design_preferences.style FROM clients JOIN projects ON clients.client_id = projects.client_id JOIN design_preferences ON projects.project_id = design_preferences.project_id;
SELECT project_name, color_scheme FROM projects LEFT JOIN design_preferences ON projects.project_id = design_preferences.project_id WHERE color_scheme = 'monochrome';
SELECT * FROM client;
SELECT client_name, email FROM client WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, phone_number FROM client WHERE email LIKE '%@company.com';
SELECT * FROM project ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description, client_name FROM project JOIN client ON project.client_id = client.client_id;
SELECT client_name, email FROM client;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT preference_id, style, color_scheme, budget FROM design_preference WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT client_name, phone_number, city, state, zip_code FROM client JOIN address ON client.client_id = address.client_id;

SELECT client.client_name, project.project_name, design_preference.style FROM client JOIN project ON client.client_id = project.client_id JOIN design_preference ON project.project_id = design_preference.project_id;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, email, phone_number FROM clients;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT project_name, start_date, estimated_completion FROM projects WHERE estimated_completion IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM clients ORDER BY client_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT client_name, email, phone_number FROM clients WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT project_name, start_date, estimated_completion FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY estimated_completion;
SELECT design_name, budget FROM designs WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY budget DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT client_name, preference_text, created_at FROM clients c JOIN preferences p ON c.client_id = p.client_id WHERE p.client_id = 1;
